name: VR Kanojo
summary: Looking for a unique VR experience? Well, look no further!In VR Kanojo, you can hang out with the lovely girl-next-door, Sakura Yuuhi. You'll practically feel her breath on your cheek and the warmth of her fingers on your arm as you laugh and talk the day away. Better yet, VR controllers simulate your hands in-game, letting you interact with her more directly. Just imagine all the possibilities!Oh yeah! And you can customize Sakura's appearance with a variety of different outfits too. Sound like fun? You bet it is!So, thanks for buying VR Kanojo, and we hope you enjoy your time with Sakura Yuuhi!
